name: Happy - Ice Cream Lite
description: Prepare your own ice cream a variety ingredients to choose from. All kind of fruit and seeds decorations, whipped creams and other special sweets want to become a perfect ice cream on your plate. Serve the perfect ice cream on the plate of your choice and make it unique with some accessories. Add a personal message or a picture and send it to us in e-mail or share on facebook. Bon Appetit!
